LightningComponentBundle.description: ESRI-integrated site selector with address search, map visualization, and geocoding. LWR/LWS compatible.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Label for the button that opens the site selector

property.name: buttonIcon
property.label: Button Icon
property.description: Icon name for the trigger button (e.g., location, map)

property.name: modalTitle
property.label: Modal Title
property.description: Title displayed in the modal header

property.name: vfPageUrl
property.label: Visualforce Page URL
property.description: Full URL to the ESRI map Visualforce page

property.name: className
property.label: Custom CSS Class
property.description: Additional CSS class for custom styling

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read-Only Mode
property.description: When enabled, displays location for review without allowing changes. Useful for back-office application review.

property.name: value
property.label: Location Value (JSON)
property.description: Pre-populated location data as JSON. Format: {address: {...}, coordinates: {latitude, longitude}}

property.name: searchOptions
property.label: Search Options (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of search type options. Default: [{value:'address',label:'Address'},{value:'coordinates',label:'Coordinates'},{value:'lot',label:'Lot/Concession'}]
